title: Order Stringer Replica
paragraphs: The Order Stringer Replica is a main weapon in Splatoon 3. It is a reskin of the Tri-Stringer.
The Order Stringer Replica is designed to look like a simplified version of the Tri-Stringer, containing only white and gray colors.
The Order Stringer Replica comes with Toxic Mist and Killer Wail 5.1. The Order Stringer Replica's stats, sub weapon, and special weapon are identical to those of the Tri-Stringer.
To unlock the Order Stringer Replica, the player must complete Side Order with Shiver's Palette.
